privacyPolicy.version: Version 2.0 - Updated for LGPD and GDPR compliance

content.welcome: Welcome to the Lynxky Privacy Policy. This policy describes how we collect, use, process and protect your personal data when you use our Lynxky application ("Application"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
content.compliance: This policy has been developed in compliance with Brazil's General Data Protection Law (LGPD, Law No. 13.709/2018) and the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR, 2016/679).
content.agreement: By using our Application, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. The personal information we collect is used to provide and improve the Application. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

content.description: Lynxky ("we", "our" or "us") is the controller of personal data collected through this Application. As controller, we are responsible for determining the purposes and means of processing your personal data.
content.name: Name: Lynxky

dataTypes.title: 3. Types of Data We Collect
dataTypes.description: We collect and process the following types of personal data:

types.registration: Registration Data: When you create an account, we collect your email address and username.
types.profile: Profile Data: Information such as profile picture, biography and custom wallpapers that you choose to add to your profile.
types.userContent: User Content: Notes and task events are encrypted and not accessible by us. This data is stored securely and can only be accessed by you through the Application.
types.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use the Application, including usage time, accessed features, preferences, frequency of use and navigation patterns.
types.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type and version, time zone configuration, plugin types and versions, operating system, platform, unique device identifiers and performance data.
types.location: Location Data: Time zone information and approximate location based on IP address (when necessary for application functionality).
types.cookies: Cookie Data: Information stored on your device to remember your preferences and maintain your session.

dataCollection.title: 4. How We Collect Your Data
dataCollection.description: We collect personal data through the following methods:

methods.directly: Directly from you, when you create an account or add content to the Application;
methods.automatically: Automatically, through cookies and similar technologies when you use our Application;
methods.thirdParty: From third-party service providers, such as authentication service providers (e.g., Google).

dataPurposes.title: 5. Data Processing Purposes
dataPurposes.description: We use your personal data for the following purposes:

purposes.storage: Allow you to store and access your notes and task events;
purposes.personalize: Personalize your experience based on your preferences;
purposes.improve: Improve our Application through analysis of how you use it;
purposes.payment: Process payment transactions for premium features (when applicable);

legalBasis.title: 6. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: We process your personal data based on the following legal justifications:

bases.consent: Consent: When you explicitly agree to the processing of your data for specific purposes;
bases.contract: Contract Performance: When processing is necessary to fulfill our terms of service with you;
bases.legitimate: Legitimate Interests: When processing is necessary for our legitimate interests and these interests are not overridden by your rights and freedoms;
bases.legal: Legal Obligation Compliance: When processing is necessary to comply with a legal obligation.

content.principle: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it, including to satisfy legal, accounting or reporting requirements.
content.factors: To determine the appropriate retention period for personal data, we consider the amount, nature and sensitivity of the personal data, the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure, the purposes for which we process your personal data and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means, as well as applicable legal requirements.
content.anonymization: In some circumstances, we may anonymize your personal data (so that it can no longer be associated with you) for research or statistical purposes, in which case we may use this information indefinitely without further notice.

dataSharing.title: 8. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We may share your personal data with the following categories of third parties:

categories.serviceProviders: Service Providers: Third parties that help us provide our Application, such as hosting providers (Supabase), payment processors (Stripe) and analytics services.
categories.authorities: Public Authorities: When required by law, court order or regulation.
categories.business: Business Partners: In the event of a merger, acquisition or asset sale, your personal data may be transferred to the acquiring company.

dataSharing.note: We require all third parties to respect the security of your personal data and treat it in accordance with the law. We do not allow our third-party service providers to use your personal data for their own purposes.

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your personal data may be transferred to, and processed in, countries outside Brazil or the European Union. In such cases, we will take measures to ensure that your personal data receives an adequate level of protection, including implementation of standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission or approved certification mechanisms.

dataSecurity.title: 10. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing and against accidental loss, destruction or damage. These measures include:

measures.monitoring: Regular monitoring and testing of our security systems;
measures.access: Restricted access to your personal data by our employees on a need-to-know basis.

yourRights.title: 11. Your Rights
yourRights.description: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

rights.access: Right of Access: You have the right to request access to your personal data that we collect;
rights.rectification: Right of Rectification: You may request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data;
rights.erasure: Right to be Forgotten: In certain circumstances, you may request deletion of your personal data;
rights.restriction: Right to Restriction of Processing: You may request that we restrict the processing of your personal data;
rights.portability: Right to Data Portability: You may request a copy of your personal data in a structured, machine-readable format;
rights.objection: Right to Object: You may object to the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances;
rights.withdraw: Right to Withdraw Consent: When processing is based on consent, you may withdraw your consent at any time;
rights.automated: Right Not to be Subject to Automated Decision-Making: You have the right not to be subject to decisions based solely on automated processing that produce legal effects.

yourRights.exercise: To exercise any of the above rights, contact us at privacy@ederin.net. We will respond to your request within 15 days.

contact.title: 19. How to Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or about the processing of your personal data, contact us:
contact.complaint: You also have the right to file a complaint with a data protection authority if you are not satisfied with how we process your personal data:

authorities.brazil: Brazil: National Data Protection Authority (ANPD) - anpd.gov.br
authorities.eu: European Union: Supervisory authority of your country of residence
